description: This file defines the CartProvider class, a ChangeNotifier that manages shopping cart lines, totals, and item quantities within a Flutter application, for an e-commerce or restaurant ordering platform.

classes.name: CartProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages cart items, totals, and updates for a Flutter app.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a MenuItem to the cart, increasing quantity if already present.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes an item from the cart based on item ID.

methods.name: decreaseQty
methods.description: Decreases the quantity of an item in the cart; removes it if quantity reaches zero.

methods.name: increaseQty
methods.description: Increases the quantity of an item in the cart.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.
